text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC The #weakPresident of the USA, @realDonaldTrump, made it absolutely POSSIBLE for the #coronavirus to thrive here - and we all in a terrible State. Millions of deaths & infections, thanks to Trump. VOTE FOR @JoeBiden!

(Unlike Trump, I know who I am endorsing!)
